definitions: able to be copied or reproduced exactly

examples.text: we think the model is easily replicable to all sorts of projects
the final design is replicable and can be deployed in a variety of locations

shortDefinitions: able to be copied or reproduced exactly

definitions: (of a scientific experiment or trial) able to be repeated to obtain a consistent result

examples.text: the identification of sustainable and replicable research strategies is essential
this area of research has failed to be able to consistently produce replicable results

shortDefinitions: (of scientific experiment) able to be repeated to obtain consistent result
